Sun.description: Represents the core self, identity, vitality, ego and life purpose.

nature.meaning: Sun burns and purifies; strong but can create ego and dominance challenges.

Sun.astrological_role: Indicator of soul purpose and individuality.

Moon.description: Symbolizes emotions, mind, intuition, nurturing and inner stability.

nature.meaning: Moon nurtures and supports emotionally, but waning Moon reduces stability.

Moon.astrological_role: Represents the emotional body and mind.

Mars.description: Represents drive, action, courage, aggression, passion and conflict.

nature.meaning: Mars provokes action but can cause conflict, anger and impulsiveness.

Mars.astrological_role: Planet of action, stamina and aggression.

Mercury.description: Governs communication, intellect, logic, learning and trade.

nature.meaning: Mercury amplifies the influence of planets it associates with; flexible nature.

Jupiter.description: Represents wisdom, knowledge, expansion, fortune and spirituality.

nature.meaning: Jupiter expands positivity, luck, wisdom and spiritual growth.

Jupiter.astrological_role: Planet of divine grace and expansion.

Venus.description: Represents love, art, beauty, pleasure, relationships and wealth.

nature.meaning: Venus grants harmony, luxury, romance and artistic expression.

Saturn.description: Represents discipline, boundaries, karma, responsibility, time and structure.

nature.meaning: Saturn brings challenges to teach patience, discipline and maturity.

Saturn.astrological_role: Planet of karmic lessons and boundaries.

Rahu.description: Shadow planet representing desires, illusions, ambition, innovation and chaos.

nature.meaning: Rahu magnifies cravings, sudden changes, illusions and unconventional thinking.

Rahu.astrological_role: North Node—amplifier of desires and futuristic tendencies.

Ketu.description: Shadow planet of spirituality, detachment, past karma, intuition and liberation.

nature.meaning: Ketu dissolves ego and attachments to promote spiritual growth.

Ketu.astrological_role: South Node—planet of liberation and karmic completion.
